thumb.name: Holiday Cheer
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ETom and Sue.%3Cbr%3Ejust wanted to add%3Cbr%3Eto your holiday cheer...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAnd to say %26#147;Merry Christmas'%3Cbr%3Eand %26#147;Happy New Year!'%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: To Great Neighbors
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EJake and Christina.%3Cbr%3EYou're Great Neighbors!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESending this wish for a Christmas%3Cbr%3EThat's merry and bright%3Cbr%3Ethrough and through.%3Cbr%3ENot just because it's the custom%3Cbr%3EAnd the %26#147;neighborly' thing to do.%3Cbr%3EBut because it's nice to have neighbors%3Cbr%3EAs warm and as friendly as you!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EEnjoy the Holiday Season

thumb.name: To A Special Friend
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor you.%3Cbr%3ESandy.%3Cbr%3Ebecause friends%3Cbr%3Eadd special meaning%3Cbr%3Eto Christmas...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...and you add%3Cbr%3Especial meaning to friendship.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMerry Christmas

thumb.name: Birth of Christ
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor You.%3Cbr%3EDana%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThe snow falls soft%3Cbr%3Eupon the night.%3Cbr%3EReflecting Christmas%3Cbr%3Ejoy and light.%3Cbr%3EThe stars look down%3Cbr%3Eupon the earth.%3Cbr%3ERemembering the Christ Child's birth.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMay the hope%3Cbr%3Ethat was born%3Cbr%3Ethat silent. holy night%3Cbr%3Eremain in your heart%3Cbr%3Ethroughout the year.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMerry Christmas

thumb.name: Gifts of Faith
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EDoug.%3Cbr%3EMay God Be with%3Cbr%3Eand Bless You%3Cbr%3EThis Christmas%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Ci%3EThose who follow%3Cbr%3EHis star%3Cbr%3Eare never lost.%3C/i%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ERemembering you at Christmas%3Cbr%3EWith a prayer that God above%3Cbr%3EWill bless you with His precious gifts%3Cbr%3EOf faith and hope and love.%3Cbr%3EFaith to make your life serene.%3Cbr%3EHope to keep it bright.%3Cbr%3EAnd most of all. God's holy love%3Cbr%3ETo be your guiding light.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMerry Christmas%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: HO-HO-WHOle Family!
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E2003%3Cbr%3EMerry Christmas. Kelly!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...from the HO-HO-WHOle%3Cbr%3EFreemont Bunch!

thumb.name: Don't Look Now
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EMorgan. We wish you a Merry Christmas. We wish you a Merry Christmas. We wish you a Merry Christmas%26#133;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EWhat are you looking in here for? We already wished you a Merry Christmas three times!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Wish for the Season
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E[Blank]%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EMay you celebrate%3Cbr%3Ethis beautiful season%3Cbr%3Ewith joy in your home.%3Cbr%3Epeace in your world.%3Cbr%3Eand love in your heart!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Holidays from the Jones family.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: A Christmas Blessing
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E[blank]%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EKelly.%3Cbr%3EBless you at Christmas%3Cbr%3E and always.

thumb.name: Holiday Greetings
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EWe wish you%3Cbr%3Ea merry Christmas...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E...and a happy New Year!

thumb.name: To Someone Very Dear
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Holidays to Randy. Someone Very Dear%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAt this festive time of year.%3Cbr%3Ethoughts often turn%3Cbr%3Eto special people...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAnd thoughts of you %3Cbr%3Eare always warm and loving. %3Cbr%3Ebecause you're such%3Cbr%3Ea dear and special friend.

thumb.name: Wishing You Love
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E[Blank]%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EMay your holiday season%3Cbr%3Ebe filled with love and joy.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Very Special Person
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EDebbie.%3Cbr%3ESome people have a special gift%3Cbr%3Efor making others happy...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMerry Christmas%3Cbr%3Eto one of those very special people.

thumb.name: His Tender Love
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EGod Be With You at Christmas and Always. Leslie%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EAs we celebrate the birthday Of Our Lord. the King of Peace. May God bless you abundantly With joys that will increase%26#133;And through the months to follow. May you find He's always near To guard you with His tender love And guide you through the year.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Remembering You
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EChristmas...%3Cbr%3EHEARTS REACH OUT%3Cbr%3EAND MEMORIES COME ALIVE%3Cbr%3EIN THE WARMTH OF LOVE.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EAndrew.%3Cbr%3EOnce again. it's Christmas -%3Cbr%3Ethat delightful time of the year%3Cbr%3EWhen hearts are filled with gratitude%3Cbr%3Eand homes are bright with cheer;%3Cbr%3EWhen everyone's remembering%3Cbr%3Egood friends and loved ones too -%3Cbr%3ESo naturally. the warmest thoughts%3Cbr%3Eand wishes go to you.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMay your home be filled%3Cbr%3Ewith happiness.%3Cbr%3Eyour hearts with love.%3Cbr%3Eyour days with joy -%3Cbr%3Eat Christmas and always!

thumb.name: Wish Away
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EHi. Chris!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EHave yourself a merry little Christmas!%3Cbr%3E
